name: Stoneworks - Demo
description:
This is a short ARPG where you take control of a rock-weaving mage in their quest to rid their underground community of a dark threat. You can summon weapons and cast spells to fight your way through an army of metal-wielding warriors and corrupted rock-mages. Take back the stronghold of a stone monstrosity who aims to control the underground and force them to do his bidding!

This is my first game using unreal engine, and it was a lot of fun! I also used maya for the first time to create most of the assets. I hope you enjoy playing it!
